meanings.definition: Looking messy or untidy in appearance.
meanings.sent1: She felt shlumpy in her wrinkled shirt.
meanings.sent2: The shlumpy room needed a good cleaning.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat looked shlumpy after playing in the mud.
meanings.sent4: The shlumpy garden resembled a wild jungle.
meanings.sent5: The shlumpy pile of clothes on the floor was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: Moving or sitting in a slouching or slumped manner.
meanings.sent1: He walked shlumpy with his shoulders drooped.
meanings.sent2: The shlumpy student sat lazily in his chair.
meanings.sent3: The shlumpy dog lounged on the couch all day.
meanings.sent4: The shlumpy tree branches hung low with ripe fruit.
meanings.sent5: The shlumpy old scarecrow leaned against the fence.
